circumstances:
The airplane departed RAF Alconbury at 2210LT on an operation to Magdeburg. It crashed almost immediately after developing a swing which could not be controlled. There were no casualties. 
Crew.
P/O E. J. Guild, 
Sgt E. P. De Ville, 
Sgt T. H. B. Jones, 
Sgt W. C. Mackenzie, 
Sgt A. Needham, 
Sgt A. D. Wallace, 
Sgt F. C. Snead.
